Question
========
Which of the following is NOT an important factor when considering model complexity?

Answerlist
----------
* Amount of available data
* Ability to capture data patterns
* Lines of code one needs to write
* Risk of overfitting

Solution
========
Lines of code one needs to write is not an important factor.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
